summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and providing for a transfer of responsibilities for implementation of the Health and Nutritional Services to Day Care Centers project from the Department of Human Resources to the Public Health Department; authorizing an interdepartmental agreement and establishing one temporary position of Community Services Representative in the Public Health Department in connection therewith; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1976 Budget of the Public Health Department by a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
